conflict.info: Find information about these packages here:
conflict.potential: {main} and {other} modify the same FoundryVTT functionality and are more likely to conflict.

external.likely-not-updated: It is likely this {type} has not been updated for FVTT {version}.

high-performance-mode.hint: This disables most dynamic conflict detection capabilities in exchange for performance, especially relevant on low-end systems. Note that this will significantly decrease the chance conflicts are detected. As such, it is recommended to turn this off when installing or updating packages.
high-performance-mode.name: High-Performance Mode

log-verbosity.hint: The verbosity of libWrapper's Javascript console messages.
log-verbosity.name: Verbosity

about.description: 'libWrapper' is a library which provides package developers with a simple way to modify core Foundry VTT code, while reducing the likelihood of conflict with other packages.
about.info: You can find more information about this module in the Foundry VTT package repository, as well as the project's Github page.
about.issue-tracker: If you encounter an internal libWrapper error, or are a package developer, you may also submit a support request in the libWrapper Github Issue Tracker.
about.name: About
about.support: If you encounter any issues, the easiest way to find support is to ask the community. The largest community-provided support channels are:

active-wrappers.name: Active Wrappers
active-wrappers.none-active: No wrappers are active right now.

deprioritized.hint:
These packages will be deprioritized compared to any package not in this list.
Higher positions in the list result in a higher priority.
deprioritized.note: Note that packages that do not use libWrapper are deprioritized even compared to these.
deprioritized.title: Deprioritized Packages

priorities.name: Priorities

prioritized.hint:
These packages will be prioritized compared to any package not in this list.
Higher positions in the list result in a higher priority.
prioritized.title: Prioritized Packages

priorities.statistics-disabled: Note: Statistics collection is disabled, not able to show unprioritized packages.

unprioritized.hint:
These packages will be neither prioritized nor deprioritized.
Priorities among these packages are decided on a first-come-first-served basis.
New packages will default to this list.
unprioritized.title: Unprioritized Packages

menu.title: libWrapper Settings Menu
menu.warning-reset-priorities: Resetting the package priorities will move all packages back to 'Unprioritized'. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
menu.warning-save: It is recommended you reload this page to apply the new package priorities. Do you wish to reload?

notify-issues-gm.hint: Whether to notify GMs when an issue is detected, for example a conflict.
notify-issues-gm.name: Notify GM of Issues

notify-issues-player.hint: Whether to notify Players when an issue is detected, for example a conflict.
notify-issues-player.name: Notify Players of Issues
